clue: New circuit, right time, hairpin leader... pole position!
explanation: N (new) O (circuit), R (right) T (time), H (hairpin leader). NORTH. Pole position!
hints: For the most part, we're building this answer from abbreviations.
An O is a kind of circuit (a circular shape).
The leader of a word is its first letter.
The definition is "pole position", but we may need to think a little laterally.
